subject: Haptic reactors
description_text:
Good morning,
I just received my pedals today, but the haptic rmotors and the fixations are missing
Are they coming in a seperate shipment???
Thx
Greetings
René Schneider

Yahoo Mail: Suchen, organisieren, erobern

conversations.body_text: Hi René Schneider,  Yes, they are packaged separately and will be shipped separately.
Hi René Schneider,    Here's another link for you.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=84150004753977
